author: Nik Popli
title: One of Marjorie Taylor Greene's Primary Challengers is Raking in Republican Cash

sentence: Although the legal challenge to Greene's candidacy was brought by a group of voters from her congressional district, Trump blamed the state's Republican Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, who he has denounced repeatedly for failing to overturn his 2020 election loss to President Joe Biden.
author: Aila Slisco
title: Trump Blames Georgia Republicans for Taylor Greene 'Going Through Hell'

sentence: The spot from Perdue, the former U.S. senator whose gubernatorial bid is strongly backed by former president Donald Trump, refers to illegal border crossings, higher gas prices, inflation, the war in Ukraine and the woke mob.? Folks, that all started right here when Brian Kemp sold us out and allowed radicals to steal the election,? Perdue tells viewers.
title: Post Politics Now Leader McCarthy, Rep. Greene both have some explaining to do about Jan. 6

title: WATCH: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene fights court challenge to her reelection
Rep. Greene declines to say if interfering with electoral count makes one an enemy of the Constitution'

sentence: Incumbent GOP Governor Brian Kemp remains the clear frontrunner in the race, with a recent poll carried out from April 22 to 27 by SurveyUSA showing he had the backing of 56 percent of Republican voters.
